articles.title: Who has scored the most runs in one ODI World Cup? - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: And which batter has collected the most ducks in the tournament's history?
articles.content: Sachin Tendulkar made 673 runs in 11 matches in the 2003 World Cup, the most by any individual player in one edition of the tournament  •  Getty Images
